C D F G I M P R S T 

C

Cast - Annotation Type in trespass.annotation
This annotation should be used when parameter types required in the signature of a method defined in a proxy interface to make it match a corresponding method declared in the target class are not accessible to the proxy interface.
createProxy(Class<P>, Object...) - Static method in class trespass.Factory
Equivalent to calling createProxy(targetClass, proxyIfc, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), args)
createProxy(Class<P>, ClassLoader, Object...) - Static method in class trespass.Factory
Create a dynamic proxy to a target class.
createProxyToObject(T, Class<P>) - Static method in class trespass.Factory
This method is equivalent to createProxyToObject(target, proxyIfc, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader())
createProxyToObject(T, Class<P>, ClassLoader) - Static method in class trespass.Factory
This method is equivalent to Factory.createProxy(Class,ClassLoader,Object...) except that the returned proxy will explicitly use the given target instance instead of trying to obtain one from a method annotated with @DefaultInstanceProvider.
